Seven questions

Introduced by Michael Bungay Stanier, the seven questions can help people, particularly those in leadership positions, become better at helping others.

Seven questions

^2e1f9e

  1. What‚Äôs on your mind? ^a2fe76
  2. And what else?
  3. What‚Äôs the real challenge here for you?
  4. What do you want?
  5. How can I help?
  6. If you‚Äôre saying yes to this, what are you saying no to?
  7. What was most useful for you?

I first learned about this concept while listening to Dare to Lead‚Äôs episode on the advice trap.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She has a keen interest in (digital) humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking.
